DOC.brief_summary: Introduction : This observational study design test equivalence clinical effectiveness microdecompression laminectomy surgical treatment central lumbar spinal stenosis . Lumbar spinal stenosis frequent indication spinal surgery elderly , old segment population continue grow prevalence likely increase . However , data surgical outcome limit . Open wide decompressive laminectomy , often combine medial facetectomy foraminotomy , formerly standard treatment . In recent year grow tendency towards less invasive decompressive procedure emerge . Many spine surgeon today perform microdecompression central lumbar spinal stenosis . Prospectively registered treatment outcome data obtain Norwegian Registry Spine Surgery ( NORspine ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Effectiveness Microdecompression Laminectomy Central Lumbar Spinal Stenosis
